Text: Electricity Sector Threat Alert Level Date Friday December est To Electricity Sector Entities From Electricity Sector Information Sharing and Analysis Center x The ESISAC is raising the Threat Alert Level for the Electricity Sector from ThreatconLow TO ThreatconMedium This is based upon the daily threat briefing and will be reviewed daily It is expected that the Medium level will last for several days The document Threat Alert Levels and Physical Response Guidelines version previously distributed is available for indivdual Entity consideration in formulating plans This advisory does NOT supersede or conflict with advisories from the Nuclear Regulatory Commission other regulatory agencies the FBI or local law enforcement
